text: Testing your app is done against permutations of browsers and operating systems.
Do your intial and exploratory testing in the most used browser/os. This guide will use Chrome and Windows.
In the search field, enter some text.
Verify: There are search results. You have just completed a 'Functional', 'Happy Path' test of Google's search.

Check for errors in 'Dev Tools' by pressing [F12]. If there are errors, then an indicator will be displayed (where the slide has been highlighted). Clicking the indicator will show you the errors in the 'Console' tab.
Select the 'Disable cache' radio button and then reload the page.
Verify: There are no 4xx or 5xx Status codes and that the page loaded in an acceptable amount of time.
